title: How to Survive Anything - A Visual Guide t(gnv64)
description: How to Survive Anything: A Visual Guide to Laughing in the Face of Adversity By Lonely Planet Lonely Planet | May 2015 | ISBN: 1743607520 | ePUB | 136 mb Earthquake imminent? Stuck in the middle seat on a long-haul flight? Here is a book that will teach you How To Survive Anything. Using the witty, graphic format it will help you withstand any challenge, from the extreme to the ordinary, that life might throw your way. CONTENTS Foreword 6 HOW TO SURVIVE…. an earthquake 12 a spacewalk 14 a night in the snow 18 Superglue accidents 22 a rip current 24 a spaghetti supper (without the splatters) 26 offending a Mafia don 28 a blind date 30 a tsunami 32 public speaking 36 the middle seat squeeze on a long-haul flight 38 sunburn 40 losing your child in a crowd 42 losing your hair 44 a border crossing 46 stress 48 being lost in the desert 52 grief 54 a snakebite 58 a visit from the in-laws 60 food poisoning 62 the seven-year itch 64 a hangover 66 a toddler’s tantrum 68 identity theft 72 a job interview 74 a wardrobe malfunction 78 being mugged 80 dress-down Friday 82 a failed parachute 84 your first week in college 86 an all-you-can-eat buffet 88 Las Vegas 90 heartbreak 94 a road trip 96 an all-nighter 98 a gunshot wound 100 and more.......... https://s1.postimg.org/4195x5kr9r/How_to_Survive_Anything.jpg
